lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobilmet™
products.information: High performance oil based cutting fluids
products.benefits: Optimum tool life and surface finish in a user friendly low mist light color fluid

products.name: Vacmul™
products.information: High quality neat grinding and honing fluids
products.benefits: Clear low odor fluids that help maximize tool life and grinding efficiency

products.name: Mobilcut™
products.information: Premium performance soluble metal removal fluids designed for a range of applications
products.benefits: Durable soluble fluids designed for long batch life, stability, resistance to foaming, and optimum surface finish and tool life

products.name: Mobil Vactra™ Oil Numbered
products.information: Premium quality slideway oils for both horizontal and vertical ways
products.benefits: Controlled frictional characteristics and good separability from many aqueous coolants supporting productivity in a variety of machining operations

products.name: Mobil Vacuoline™ 1400
products.information: Premium slideway lubricant.
products.benefits: Slideway lubricant for traditional box way lubrication and vertical ways where a high degree of adhesion is required

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Premium quality electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Helps extend bearing life to improve electric motor reliability

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oil
products.benefits: Improved equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; longer gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; extended oil life

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP
products.information: Premium quality gear oil
products.benefits: Micropitting performance, bearing protection, and seal compatibility helps to improve gearbox performance and life

products.name: Mobil Velocite™ Numbered
products.information: Premium quality spindle and high speed bearing lubricant
products.benefits: Maximum protection of high speed bearings in machine tool spindles

products.name: Mobiltemp SHC™ 32
products.information: High temperature, low viscosity clay thickened lubricating grease
products.benefits: Extended grease life and bearing protection in high speed applications

products.name: Mobil Vactra™ Oil Numbered
products.information: Premium quality slideway oils for both horizontal and vertical ways
products.benefits: Controlled frictional characteristics and good separability from many aqueous coolants supporting productivity in a variety of machining operations

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 20
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils designed to satisfy a wide range of hydraulic equipment requirements
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic systems clean preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to improve equipment reliability and life;  can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; extended regreasing interval - reduced service cost

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 20
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils designed to satisfy a wide range of hydraulic equipment requirements
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic systems clean preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to improve equipment reliability and life;  can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs

products.information: Patent Pending hydraulic fluid designed to meet the demands of modern industrial hydraulic equipment

products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; extended regreasing interval - reduced service cost
